text: The Pârâul Chintenilor (also: Chinteni) is a left tributary of the river Someșul Mic in Romania. It discharges into the Someșul Mic in Cluj-Napoca. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice – județul Cluj Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Cluj County
title: Pârâul Chintenilor
